metadata.title: CVE-2024-35812 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: cdc-wdm: close race between read and workqueuewdm_read() cannot race with itself. However, inservice_outstanding_interrupt() it can race with theworkqueue, which can be triggered by error handling.Hence we need to make sure that the WDM_RESPONDINGflag is not just only set but tested.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
